attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I petition the PM to instruct the Energy Companies, in light of recent dramatic reductions in the wholesale supply of energy, to make an Xmas 2008 repayment to all domestic and small business consumers of 10% of currently estimated annual fuel bills. This would, particularly, give further relief to pensioners and other low income households, in addition to the recently increased winter fuel payments to over-60's.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
